trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control in an application that was upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ListBox` and `ComboBox` controls use a `List` property to store list items and an `ItemData` property to optionally store an `Integer` associated with each list item.

In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property to store list items, and the `ItemData` property is no longer supported.

When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a `ListBoxItem` class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.

When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the list item.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.

When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the list item.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that represents the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""></xref> value.

Stores the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""></xref> value for an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control in an application that was upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
To be added.

Stores the <xref uid="langword_csharp_List" name="List" href=""></xref> value for an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control in an application that was upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
To be added.
Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must call the `ToString` method to convert the type.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
